p: The MOF//ZIF-8@Zn ZIBs were constructed based on the Mn(BTC) cathode, ZIF-8@Zn anode, an air-laid paper separator, and 2 M ZnSO 4 (or 2 M ZnSO 4 + 0.1 M MnSO 4) electrolyte. CV and GCD measurements were taken on the Bio-Logic VMP3 electrochemical station and the LAND CT2001 battery tester, respectively.
